reasoning: PSC is a rare, progressive autoimmune liver disease with incidence of approximately 1.1 per 100k person-years. Estimate based on population-based studies from Northern Europe where incidence is ~1.2-1.3 per 100k, adjusted downward to account for lower rates in other regions.
source: Trivedi PJ et al. (2016). Primary sclerosing cholangitis. Lancet. 387(10031):2011-2027
